title: Local nonprofit’s health food-for-kids tools on display at Apple Store
text:
Local nonprofit’s health food-for-kids tools on display at Apple Store 
Metro Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Getting kids to ditch junk food and eat healthy is no easy task.According to one local company, though, the way to children's stomachs is through their iPads."The first place they go when they have a question is the Internet," said Natasha Lance Rogoff, CEO and founder of Somerville's...
